- Added Support for A12 Devices This item is now Free.

- add support for iOS 10.3.3
- add support for iOS 11
- add support for iOS 12

- added iOS 10 Support -added support for iOS 9.3.3 - fixed Bug for Paypal
- some improvements for Facebook
-added iOS 9 compatibility -fixed compatibility for Pandora Downloader

-bug fixed for compatibility with BatterieLife

- fixed isues for the Settings

-bug fixes and improvements for iOs 8.3

Added ios 8.3 support - works now with any Application that plays an Sound/Video (including Games)
- you can now exclude Apps
- you can now enable/disable for Background Musik
